discussion.content: I believe the definitions of https and rbac has been swapped in the given answer. Rbac is token based while library call to APIs take place over https.

comments.content: spanning-tree bpduguard enable - valid comand. bpduguard no filter
Sorry, misclick. root guard unvalid term.

discussion.content: The correct answer is D. - Root Guard protects the Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) topology attack of replacing the original Root Bridge with a rogue Root Bridge.

questions.question_text: Which feature can prevent a rogue device from assuming the role of the root bridge in a switching domain?

discussion.content: D is the correct answer there

comments.content: To add a VLAN to the trunk, issue the switchport trunk allowed vlan add vlan-list command.

choices.B: Switch(config-if)# no switchport trunk remove vlan10
choices.C: Switch(config-if)# switchport trunk allowed vlan add10

questions.question_text: Which command do you enter to allow a new VLAN across a trunk?
